name: UpdateLandingPagesBatch
description:
Batch update landing pages in HubSpot CMS.

Use this tool to update multiple landing page objects in HubSpot CMS by providing their identifiers and new data in the request body.

parameters.name: updated_landing_pages_json
parameters.description: JSON data representing the updated Landing Pages, including identifiers and new values.

value_schema.description: The JSON representation of the updated Landing Pages.

parameters.name: update_deleted_landing_pages
parameters.description: Set to true to update deleted (archived) Landing Pages. Defaults to false.

value_schema.description: Specifies whether to update deleted Landing Pages. Defaults to `false`.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_cms API.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Specifies whether to update deleted Landing Pages. Defaults to `false`.

value_schema.description: Specifies whether to update deleted Landing Pages. Defaults to `false`.

parameters.name: requestBody
parameters.description: The JSON representation of the updated Landing Pages.

value_schema.description: The JSON representation of the updated Landing Pages.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
